thread.title: Police nab top drug pusher in Quezon town
thread.title_full: Police nab top drug pusher in Quezon town

title: Police nab top drug pusher in Quezon town
text:
Inquirer Southern Luzon / 12:29 PM March 19, 2017 Shabu (INQUIRER FILE PHOTO) 
LUCENA CITY – Authorities arrested on Saturday a top drug suspect in Quezon province, police said Sunday. 
Senior Supt. Rhoderick Armamento, Quezon provincial director, identified the suspect as Jason Flordeliz alias “Jojo”, 42, whom he said was number 3 on the list of most wanted drug traffickers in Candelaria town. 
Armamento said a team led by Chief Insp. Hobert Sarmiento, Candelaria deputy chief of police, collared Flordeliz after he sold shabu to an informant in Barangay Malabanban Sur at about 7 p.m. ADVERTISEMENT 
The arrest was in coordination with the Philippine Drug Enforcement Agency, the provincial director added. 
Authorities seized “shabu” worth P1,200 from the suspect. CBB/rga
